name: White Drop
description:
Back in college, some friends and I had a group called BKGM, our first "game studio", which taught us a lot about game development. This is one of our very first games, featuring a similar gameplay to Flappy Bird. It's pretty fun tho, at least for us. So I decided to remake it (and hopefully more of my old projects) into a Pico-8 cart, as a commemorative project.

Hope you enjoy it!
